events.message: I was involved in a sudden car collision yesterday and need to file a claim for damages to my vehicle.
The claim regarding the auto accident has been received and categorized under Auto Accident for processing.
An agent has been assigned to handle your vehicle accident claim and will contact you shortly.
Your claim for the car accident has been formally acknowledged by our insurance company today.
Please submit the photos of the damaged vehicle and the police report for further investigation.
All requested documents including car photos and accident police report have been successfully submitted.
Our investigation team has begun reviewing the details provided for the auto collision claim.
The investigation into the car accident claim has been completed with all evidence verified.
A settlement offer for the vehicle damages has been proposed to you based on assessment results.
You have accepted the proposed settlement offer and expressed satisfaction with the process so far.
The auto accident claim has been officially approved by our claims department effective today.
Payment for the approved car damage claim has been successfully issued to your bank account.
Your automobile accident claim case is now officially closed following settlement payment.
The files and documentation related to your vehicle accident claim have been archived securely.
